p: Legs, wings and bodies from individual mosquitoes were placed into separate 2 ml screw cap vials with 1 ml MD with 4–5 zirconium silica beads. The samples were homogenized by shaking the tubes for 90 s in a chilled block using a MiniBeadbeater-96 sample homogenizer (Biospec Products, Bartlesville, OK, USA) followed by centrifugation at 17,000× g for 10 min at 4 °C. Supernatants were transferred to sterile tubes.
